storyInfo: Upon settling near Kazdel, the Mudrock Squad expressed a common wish: they want some beer.

attributes.content: Bob, I've given your generous offer in your last letter some serious thought. While I do appreciate your gesture, I won't be departing for Columbia just yet.
We've decided to stay in a settlement outside Kazdel for now, to give our legs a rest.
It's true, we came a long, long way—literally one foot into Kazdel before turning around.
We hesitated, pondered, even argued... but we could neither enter nor leave Kazdel. None of us can quite say why.
Perhaps I still haven't made up my mind.
Perhaps the changes in Kazdel haven't made it that much better.
Or perhaps most of us simply don't have it in us to start another long journey.
On another note, we have a favor to ask. It embarrasses me to say, and I'm unsure if this even falls under your services.
Since this might prove troublesome, please allow me to apologize in advance. All that said, if possible, my friends and I...
...would like some beer.
If a regular supply is unlikely, at least bring some for Sauin Day? We're hoping to join the costume parade and really need some beers for that.
*cough*, *cough*... Goddamn choking here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You're wearing a mask.
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Doesn't keep out dust. Go bother Liza if you must, Jürgen. She's covered from head to toe
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Mudrock, welcome back! Is the letter mailed? Can you say if we'll get the beer before Sauin or not?
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Mudrock. The beer?
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Mudrock?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: There was no Messenger. I had to give it to the Rhodes Island Office, for them to forward.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: That's gonna drag things out some more...
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: You can't find a single bottle of beer anywhere in Kazdel?
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: (Shrug) Why else would Mudrock write to Big Bob about it?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Dammit, no. We promised her we'd drink beer on Sauin, so we're getting it. We've got to do this ourselves.
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Are you suggesting we... brew beer?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: He's talking out of his ass. Like hell it's that simple to brew.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Oh, you'd know ass-talk, wouldn't you?
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Brewing's not even that hard. Steep barley in water to get the malt. Then you mash it, lauter it, add the hops, and then let it ferment.
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: We have all the ingredients, except the hops...
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: We can look around. Brewing's easy according to him, right? He must know what hops look like.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I do, thank you!
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: But if you ask me, why are you all on board now? Five seconds ago you said I was talking—
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Shut your trap, Jürgen, I'm gonna go tell everyone we're brewing.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You hear that, Jürgen? It's happening. You better hold up your end.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Aah, well, see, hahaha...
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: I'll make it with you.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: We all will.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: A few days later...
...No, hops are nothing like this.
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: How about these?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: (Sniff) No. That's sourer than Homburg's socks.
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Some place Kazdel turned out to—uh, I mean, where we're camping is insanely barren. You made it sound different on the journey.
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: But I don't... recall saying Kazdel was lush with plants.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Was it someone else who said that? I think it was by the Winterwisp Mountains, during a snowy night...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: No, never mind.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: No... You're right.
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: It was snowing that day and we were starving like mad, but the nearby villagers already picked all the wild radishes clean...
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: We were hungry and shivering in this rundown shack when Anya started it. She said at least Kazdel would have wild radishes. We then listed every nice place we could think of.
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Lush hills, thick rainforests, fertile valleys cut with rivers... oh, and how could I forget, fields of barley and hops. That couldn't be Kazdel in a million years.
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Jürgen, if you want to enter Kazdel—
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Then I can, I know. But I rather not sneak down the streets like a rat.
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Not it. No. Not it—
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Haha, speak of the dev... *cough* delicious radish!
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Are you sure they're wild radishes?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Yup, and as many as you want! I guess Kazdel heard us back then!
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: *Leithanian swearing* you've got wild radish, now just give us some hops for crying out loud!
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Let's just keep looking—
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Wait, Mudrock, hold still.
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Some kind of cone just fell on your head. I'll grab it, don't move or it'll fall.
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Got it. Now, what are you... Let me take a whiff...
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: You're it, I think. This might just do.
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Ten days later...
Mudrock, what brings you here?
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Everyone wants to hear how the beer is doing, so I came to see.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: It's doing, duh. It's fermenting.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: It's insane to me that Jürgen's not a total write-off. He looks competent while he's malting and boiling. Fermentation just stumps him, though, so I have to step in.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: I thought he was the only one left in our squad who could brew.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Hello? Forgetting someone?
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: You—Um...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Yes. You brewed a wonderful wildberry wine in the tundra.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Here I thought you forgot. Berry wine... That was years ago. We were still in Reunion, weren't we?
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Mm. They called you Liza the 'Sugarlips' and 'Cherry Fangs'.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Hah! Guess it's all flooding back to you.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Liking my liquor on the sweeter side's no crime. How did 'Sugarlip' even stick? Am I that much of a sweet-talker?
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Cherry Fangs, though, that was perfect.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Your teeth were constantly stained red with berries—I remember. Though you were always wearing a mask.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Hahaha, look who's talking.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: You know, those times when we gave each other nicknames, joked around, and got drunk without any fighting sure passed quickly.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: You decided to leave right around that time, right?
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Mm.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: At first, out in the tundra, Reunion felt like a house with a warm hearth. Like a... home.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: But as time went by, it turned into a raging, charging tank, burning everything in its path: snow, trees... even the earth.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: That's why, besides your usual Sarkaz pals, a few Ursus outcasts chose to tag along when you up and left.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: And that's also why Leithanians like Jürgen and Anya chose to stick it out with us. Because of you.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Nothing to be sorry about.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: I know. You want Kazdel to be a home to us all, and yet we're not even getting into the city for Sauin fun times.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: But so what? We're outcasts from our own homes anyway, right? Doesn't seem too bad to be permanent, unwanted guests at Kazdel.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: I mean, we wouldn't even come to this Sauin thing if Anya—
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: *clicks tongue* Goddamn fermenter bin sprung a gas leak again. I'll patch it.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Crap, there's too much pressure!
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: I'll help!
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: No, we can't let any soil get in! Let me—
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Goddamn homburg-wearing son of a bitch, couldn't find a worse bin if he tried!
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Mudrock, are you—oh, you're okay. You're covered up even tighter than me.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Oof, it's time I get my own suit of armor. I'll start with the face. Maybe I'll just use Homburg's...
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Mudrock?
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: It smells nice.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Now that you mentioned it... yeah. It does.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: But—our ingredients...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Relax, we just need new malt, and I know Jürgen has a whole secret stash of hops. He can't hide jack from me.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Secret stash? What for?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: You'd never guess—it's his pillow stuffing.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: He sleeps like a log every night on it. Snores louder than an Originium buzzsaw.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Oh right. Want some berries?
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Berries?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I traded for some from a caravan while buying yeast. Was going to brew berry wine after the beer fermented, but they weren't even sweet. Just good for eating.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: As she speaks, the Ursus woman lifts a corner of her mask and pops a berry in her mouth.
Bleugh, no flavor at all.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: I'd take the tundra's berries in a heartbeat.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Weeks later...
Sauin Day
Mudrock, the parade's starting soon. We'd better get ready. How's Jürgen and Liza's end? Is the beer done?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: We'll find out very soon.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: And just in case, how about Big Bob?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Still no word.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: ...Alright.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Why are you just standing there?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: I'm thinking... about Kazdel.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: What's there to think about when you're already here? Look, the big ol' furnace is right there.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: But is this Kazdel... really the very same place we'd been heading for?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Clearly it's not.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: A lot of it was Anya, you know, puffing Kazdel up to kingdom come as we went. Made me cringe to listen to.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: But if Kazdel really was like that, I sure don't mind living in it for a few days—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Okay, let's get back to camp. I'm dying to drink some beer here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: ...Did it not work?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Well, not exactly, it's just—how do we put this...
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Don't bother, just show them our magnum opus. Here, try just a shot to start.
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: It smells great—
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Urp...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: ...It's vinegar.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: *chuckle*
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: You're laughing?
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: What else am I supposed to do? Cry? You think Anya wants to see you cry?
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: ANYA IS NOT—
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.text: 'I'm the first of the Mudrock Squad to die in Kazdel. It is a comfort to die in my homeland. When I'm gone, please scatter my ashes into the sea—'
'...You're not really thinking of going to Iberia, are you? I've heard the rumors, and I refuse to become Seaborn food!'
'I'll settle for the next best thing. How about you place my remains in the Soul Furnace? That must be a first for a Caprinae, right—'
'Gosh, can't you guys tell when I'm joking? Don't tell me you were seriously considering going against all of Kazdel?'
'Okay, I'll be serious now. I hear there will be a costume parade outside the city during Sauin Day.'
'I want all of you to go. Go have a good time, see the sights, and drink some beer. Not that awful Kazdel moonshine, but real beer. And when you do, just take me along, and I'll be happy.'
'...All I did was mention beer, and now all of you are drooling? What happened to feeling sad for me? Mudrock, at least promise me you'll get these poor suckers some beer on Sauin Day, okay?'
'It's been so long since we remembered how to laugh...'

attributes.content: The Leithanian stares at his ex-Reunion squadmate—
—and abruptly snatches the drink out of Mudrock's hands, downing the vinegar in one clean gulp.
Jürgen!
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Mudrock, it's fine, I'm great—*ghaack*!
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: I'm telling you, Liza. I'm going to Kazdel today, and I'll be there in the parade...
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: ...Drinking sparkling vinegar!
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: The tense atmosphere instantly relaxes and pockets of laughter can be heard from the group.
Mudrock?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Jürgen said it. Let's pick up Anya, and our 'beer'... and go to Kazdel.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Shame, I thought we'd really get to drink beer. Any word from Big Bob?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: It's getting dark. We can't afford to wait for him anymore.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Everyone, get yourselves ready. We're going to Kazdel now.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Today is Sauin. Since we'll be going to a costume parade, I suggest you all... erm...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Get creative.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I'm not sure if the other Sarkaz there will object to our presence, so, I'd disguise as close to a Sarkaz as you can to be safe.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: The other Sarkaz and I will lead the way for you.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Look at my handcrafted fake horns. Aren't they just so realistic? Step up, step up, I'll crown anyone without their own!
attributes.name: Feline Squadmember

attributes.content: You call this handiwork? I can't even get it on my ears!
attributes.name: Ursus Squadmember

attributes.content: My handiwork is just fine! It's not my fault your ears are too round!
attributes.name: Feline Squadmember

attributes.content: What about me, then? I'm not sanding my horns! You don't know how much it hurts!
attributes.name: Caprinae Squadmember

attributes.content: Costume, think costume! Just put on a hat or something and you're safe!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Squadmember

attributes.content: I hear some of the city folk dress up as Sankta too. Here, stick this halo on your head.
attributes.name: Elafia Squadmember

attributes.content: Liiiike... *Sarkaz swearing*, this thing glows HARD!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Squadmember

attributes.content: Look, it's Mudrock's gang.
attributes.name: Kazdelian Outskirter A

attributes.content: They always have that many Sarkaz? Don't the horns on that one look... wonky?
attributes.name: Kazdelian Outskirter B

attributes.content: And look at those horns poking out of the hat. That's a Caprinae for sure...
attributes.name: Kazdelian Outskirter B

attributes.content: Hey, forget them, check me out!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Squadmember

attributes.content: Oh, we're getting to you. Tell me, what's a real Sarkaz doing with a HALO?
attributes.name: Kazdelian Outskirter A

attributes.content: Isn't this all a bit too—
attributes.name: Kazdelian Outskirter B

attributes.content: Nah, it's all good. If they got horns, then they're Sarkaz!
attributes.name: Kazdelian Outskirter A

attributes.content: But she hasn't got—
attributes.name: Kazdelian Outskirter B

attributes.content: It's called commitment! Sorry you can't appreciate an authentic Reunion costume!
attributes.name: Kazdelian Outskirter A

attributes.content: You get it!
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Here, take a swig, I guarantee it'll knock you off your feet!
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Beer? Beer this bubbly? Damn, I haven't had a drink in forever, let me get a taste of that—
attributes.name: Kazdelian Outskirter A

attributes.content: PWFFFT—that's vinegar!
attributes.name: Kazdelian Outskirter A

attributes.content: *hearty laughter*
attributes.name: Paraders

attributes.content: The Sarkaz who can't or won't enter Kazdel all seem to notice this ragtag band of misfits.
Given the limitations, most of the Mudrock Squad's disguises are far too easy to see through.
But on this night, everyone rather pretend that they don't know.
Just like they rather believe that these outlanders are the same as them, having come a long, long back home...
Back to Kazdel.
Hahaha... *burp*!
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Jürgen, enough. Quit pouring vinegar down your stomach.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What's this about vinegar? If I say it's beer, it's beer!
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Jürgen...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Hey, Mudrock! We're having a good time, right? Like Anya said?
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: What do you think, Anya? Is this what you had in mind?
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: It's getting late. It's time we moved on to the last thing.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: ...What's that?
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: We're... going to Kazdel.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: It's fine, though. Even Anya said it's not worth it to go against the entire city just for her...
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: It'll be okay.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Let me... take Anya.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: The Leithanian passes the urn to Mudrock.
She stands firm.
The night wind whistles around her, but she remains silent, like a boulder.
Kazdel doesn't just have to be where the Soul Furnace is.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: The soils, the bogs, and the sands. Perhaps in those serene, expansive, and peaceful places, can we find our true Kazdel...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Our true home.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: The group simmers down. Quietly, they wait.
Until Mudrock places the urn down, and murmurs faint words to the earth.
Until the earth tremors and the mud and rocks answer her call, forming a furnace roughly the height of a person, as they have done for Mudrock countless times during the journey here.
Until firewood is placed in the furnace and a modest flame is kindled, there is no wailing or bellowing—only the soft crackling of the firewood.
Mudrock.
Mudrock!
Is that you...?!
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I didn't expect you'd be all the way out here. You sure gave me some trouble.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Nice seeing you again, Mudrock.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: ...Bob?! It really is you—you came!
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: I got held up a little on the way, but I made sure I got here just on time.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: But your camp was empty when I got there, so I was worried something happened. Good thing I haven't lost all my skills from my bounty hunter days—
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Bob!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Big Bob! You actually came!
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: I had to. The Mudrock Squad wants beer, and who am I to say no?
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: So you're... Big Bob? You brought us beer... for real?
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Oh, are you the new guy?
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: You got it. Everyone, I give you, beer!
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Bob's Farm special brew, brought to you by courtesy of the owner, and enough for the whole Mudrock Squad.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: But judging by the mood, now's not a good time to pop caps?
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: No, no...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Bob, the timing is perfect. Now's the right time... for some beer.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Mudrock opens the urn and scatters the ashes of a warrior who has traveled a long way home into the flames.
Then, she takes a beer from Big Bob.
She pours the golden, foamy liquid into the furnace, causing a few cracks and bangs, echoing like the laughter of a friend who arrived too late for the Sauin parade.
(Sniffle)
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: Damn the smoke's choking, right?
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: ...Yeah, and you all know how my mask... doesn't block dust.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Anya... Anya...
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Sobs can be heard from the Mudrock Squad as the remaining paraders gather by the furnace.
Watching the dancing flames, each one reflects on those who should have been here but are no longer.
...Bob, got more beer?
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Plenty more.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Gimme one! I'm not gonna let Anya drink the lot!
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Everyone... come get your bottle.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Uh, if you have any spare...
attributes.name: Kazdelian Outskirter A

attributes.content: Here!
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: My Originium refrigeration broke down on the road anyway! With this much to drink, the Mudrock Squad is gonna need all your help!
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: The cold beers work their magic, and the tears soon stop.
Stiff upper lips relax, and tipsy faces flush with red. Sobbing turns to singing, which blossoms into hearty conversations.
The aroma of hops drifts into the darkness, where the souls slumber.
Mudrock! If you can make shelters and Colossi out of earth, you think you can uh... *burp* make something... uhh... poetic?
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Poetic?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Like—if you turn all this Kazdelian wasteland into soil so dark and rich you could drink it—that's right... turn it into a barley field!
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Turn it into a berry orchard!
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: I vote barley field.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: See—see!
attributes.name: Leithanian Infected

attributes.content: Homburg, think carefully! The only thing Jürgen can brew is sparkling vinegar! If I get my orchard, I promise you'll have berry wine every single day!
attributes.name: Ursus Caster

attributes.content: BER-RY WINE! BER-RY WINE!
attributes.name: Gleeful Crowd

attributes.content: Bob, thank you. We couldn't have done this without you.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: No. Something tells me, even without any beer to save you from drinking piss, it's still a cozy Sauin tonight.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Also, I'm sorry. I wrote before that I'd visit you in Columbia, but now you had to come to Kazdel first.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Nah, I kinda like it here. Columbia's got the wheat fields and the hops, but there's also the ATAO...
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: The... ATAO?
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: The Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Arts Units and Originium. In short, pesky taxmen who won't give me a break.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: I thought about sending someone to deliver the beers, but I needed some time away from the ATAO. Plus, had to make sure nothing went wrong with the beers.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Besides, you did ask me for a sample of hops, right? Figured I'd just bring you a whole truck of beer.
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: But what will happen when you get back...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Who knows! Those hounds love to bite. They might have me arrested the second I'm back on Colombian soil! Haha!
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Haha...
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: What about you? You and your crew gonna bunk here for good?
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: No. There'll be a day when we leave, when we resist.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Against who?
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: Ursus's lords, Leithanien's nobles... No, not just them.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: Oh, music to my ears. Can you put the ATAO on your list?
attributes.name: Big Bob

attributes.content: (Smiles) Assuming we do go to Columbia.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: But truth be told, it's a lot harder resisting the things you have to... than the things you choose to.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: The two fall silent, while over by the furnace, the lively banter carries on.
But for now, at least, the fact that we're still alive, carrying our dreams and memories, and laughing from our hearts—it's our own, small way of resisting.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: In our collective home.
attributes.name: Mudrock

attributes.content: In Kazdel.
attributes.name: Mudrock
